directions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes. Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water, and peel.
Stir avocado, onion, and parsley into the eggs.
Mix relish, yogurt, and mustard into egg mixture. Season with salt and black pepper.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Yogurt Egg Salad
